From the brand

OBABA is committed to providing a variety of high-quality Christmas decorations, mainly including indoor and outdoor string lights, Lighted Boxes Decorations, Christmas Candy Cane Pathway Lights, Cartoon Toy, Inflatables Decorations, Snow Tube to add color and joy to your Christmas.

240 LED String Lights

End-to-End Expandable: Each colored lights set with tail plug can connect up to 4 sets,the max expandable length is 196 feets, which allows you to decorate the lighting arear with the desired length and pastel lights.
Safety & Waterproof: UL certified 30V output adapter ensure xmas lights safety.IP 44 Waterproof led c9 lights are perfect for outdoor indoor use. BUT the adapter is not waterproof and should be kept indoors.
Christmas Decorations: Fairy string lights can be used at home,balcony,patio,garden,shopping centers. Holiday decor christmas lights outdoor for birthdays,party,wedding,thanksgiving day, also great for Christmas tree,or wherever decoration lighting is needed.
Guarantee & Service: Online response within 24 hours. If you have any questions about strawberry string lights, please fell free to contact us.

OBABA C9 Christmas Lights Outdoor

Extendable pastel lights 50 LED 49ft Waterproof Fairy String Light Christmas Decorations for Patio, Xmas Tree, Wedding Party Decorations.

OBABA Holiday season LED Christmas string lights

Each outdoor Christmas light designs with tail plug, can connect up to 4 sets of C9 string lights.

Make your home shine and sparkle！

Connect end to end to 4 sets

Classic design and energy saving LED bulbs.

Perfect for Indoor and Outdoor Decor!

Specifications:

  • Light Color: Multicolor/ Warm Yellow
  • LED Quantity: 50 Led
  • Total Length: 49 FT
  • Power Source: Adapter Powered (AC)
  • Bulb spacing: 0.65 ft

Waterproof IP44

Indoor outdoor c9 christmas lights can resist all kind of weather. BUT note the adapter is not waterproof and should be kept indoors.

Safe

UL certified power adapter, low voltage will not overheat . Sturdy construction allows colored christmas lights to be used for multiple festivals.

Application

Led pastel lights string can be used for birthdays, weddings, Halloween, Christmas, Valentine’s Day, graduations, fashion shows and so on.

Warranty & Support

Price: $18.49 - $13.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:32:31 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Xindell was established in 2016, focusing on the cleaning and maintenance of car windshields, and has professional and meticulous car care products and services, OEM car replacement parts.

Xindell Windshield Cleaner ensure that apart from online avenue, we have a strategic location, investing in state-of-the-art equipment and excellent friendly staff.

What Makes Our Products Unique?

a)Fast and Easy to Cleaning Auto Windshield

b)Get to the hard-to-reach area of vehicle windshield pretty well

c)Car windshield cleaning kit designed with 180°swiveled triangular head to make a complete contact to the glass

d)Fit with the glass surface very well

e)Multiple Uses

f)Anti-skid & Durable

How to Clean Inside Car Windows?

Spray your preferred brand of glass cleaner on the microfiber cleaning cloth and wipe down the inside of the windshield. This should remove what did not come off with just the microfiber cloth.

SHOP XINDELL STORE

Fast and Easy to Cleaning Auto Windshield: Most used to dread cleaning their car mainly because of that it was a big hassle to clean the windshield. Not anymore! Clean car window interiors and exteriors. No more hurting your back. The windshield cleaner is designed with the Extra Long extension handle and pivoting head getting to those hard-to-reach car window bases is simple. XINDELL windshield cleaning tool can remove more dirt and dust, easy to clean the hard-to-reach areas effortlessly.
Helps get the hard-to-reach area of vehicle windshield pretty well! Car windshield cleaning kit designed with 180°swiveled triangular head to make a complete contact to the glass, which fit with the glass surface very well, easy to clean the bottom of car windows or some hard-to-reach areas, from interior to exterior, easy to use and effortless. Long ergonomic handle, easily extend to hard-to-reach window bases, leaving surfaces for even cleaning.
Multiple Uses: Works great as a fog & moisture removal tool. Easy windshield cleaner is safe to use on all surfaces and won’t scratch, ideal for interior & exterior cleaning, great for cars, such as trucks, SUVs and recreational vehicles of all sizes. The EASY windshield cleaning brush tool also are suitable for kitchens, bathrooms, furniture, mirrors, ceramic, shower stalls and other household needs! Also ideal for de-misting your windscreen in winter. No need to wait your vehicle warm up.
Anti-skid & Durable: The cleaning pad pole use aluminum alloy material, lightweight and won’t rust, more durable than plastic one, the end of the handle is with soft sponge, non-slip and comfortable to hold. 3 pcs Washable & Reusable Pads made of fine fiber fluffed material, can remove more dirt and dust, easy to clean, which helps keep it effective. The microfiber cloth helps to remove dirt, dust, and fingerprints on the glass. Great Design Car Window Cleaner!
Special Instructions: ●Interior Windshield Cleaning: Can be used dry pad or spray a small amount of water on the pad and wipe clean. Refrain from drenching the surface or smudges will appear. ●Exterior Windshield Cleaning: Can be used dry pad. ●Fog Removal: simply wipe glass with no added water or liquid chemical. ●Stubborn stains on the glass: Can be spray a little Glass Cleaning Fluid for wiping. ●No chemical or soap is needed to clean the surface, just a little water.

XINDELL UPGRADE WINDSHIELD CLEANING TOOL

The ultimate design goal of XINDELL windshield cleaner is to easily clean the car.

  • Is it hard for you to clean the whole of your car’s windscreen?
  • Does dirty windshield annoy you?
  • Is it always fog and moisture?
  • No longer worry about that as XINDELL windshield cleaner tool can be your good partner to clean your car windshield at ease.

Read more

The windshield cleaning tool can remove dust ,dirt and fingerprints on the glass, easy to clean the hard-to-reach areas.

-Ergonomic Design

–

  • The windshield cleaner with the long extendable handle and pivoting head easily reach into the driver and passenger side corner and other angles.
  • The windshield cleaner with the long extendable handle and pivoting head easily reach into the driver and passenger side corner and other angles.

– Product Instructions

–

  • When you clean the windshield: you can use a dry pad to wipe the dust; You also can spray slight water or glass cleaning liquid on the pad to wipe the stubborn stains. Don’t wet the cloth completely.
  • Remove the mist from the internal windshield: you can directly use our window brush to wipe it.
  • No chemicals or soap are needed to clean the pads, just water.

-Replaceable windshield brush pads

–

  • Made of microfiber material can remove more dust and dirt, easy to clean, washable, and reusable.
  • The Windshield Cleaning Tool Kit includes:
  • 1 * Car Windshield Cleaner
  • 3 * Microfiber Bonnets
  • 1 * Empty Spray Bottle

Read more

Read more

【POWERFUL MAGNET】Maximum suction weight up to 5lb, easily find and grab lost items in hard to reach areas, helpful when working in automobiles, construction, HVAC and other home projects. Note: the amount of suction is related to the contact area and location of the absorbent article
【TELESCOPING HANDLE】Made from aluminum alloy, making tools shockproof. Handles extend up to 34.65inch, help to grab lost items in far to reach areas. Anti-slip, oil-resistant plastic coating and ergonomic design, provides comfortable grip and more effortless use.
【SUPER BRIGHT FLASHLIGHT】3 super bright LED bulbs, Magnet head and base, 360°swivel neck, 2.5lb maximum suction weight with extended 2″ stainless steel pocket clip help to illuminate and grab tools in dark narrow places.
【360° ROTATION ROUND & SQUARE INSPECTION MIRRORS】Made from premium-quality glass for perfect reflection, all-angled ball joint holds mirrors for 360 degree free viewing and keeps it from swinging, square mirror has LED lights facilitate inspection of dark areas.
【COMPACT PORTABLE TOOL BAG】Small size carries wealth of tools, easy to carry. Made of Oxford cloth, resist to wear and tear. Extended hand strap design, easy to carry and store. Additional pocket with hook and loop fasteners on the bag for gathering tools conveniently. Separate elastic band inside, help to organize.

JUSTTOP Windshield Cleaning Tool, Car Window Cleaner with Unbreakable Extendable Long-Reach Handle and Washable Reusable Microfiber Cloth, Car Exterior Accessories, Green
Extendable Handle: The extendable handle not only contains the soft sponge cover to ensure your comfort when cleaning the window; but also the adjustable length of the handle also makes it easier to clean the vehicle glass. The handle is 9.45-15.35 inch and whole cleaner is 10.83-16.73 inch, which is long enough to allow you to clean any position of the car glass.
180°Swiveled Triangular Head: Designed with pivoting Square head to make a complete contact to the glass, which can be rotated 180 degrees to fit the glass surface very well, easy to clean the bottom of car windows or some hard-to-reach areas, easy to use and effortless.
Removable Microfiber Cloth Pads: The car window cleaner includes 3 pieces of microfiber pads for easy replacement, wet and dry use. The towel is made of soft microfiber and the surface of the fabric is finely treated , which must clean your vehicle well and never cause streaking after cleaning.
Wide Application: The windshield cleaner is great for all size cars, SUV, trucks, Jeeps, UTVs, ATVs and so on. You can also used for cleaning house, include windows, television, monitor, kitchen walls, bathrooms mirrors, even tables and floors at home.
Easy Use: Simply slip one of the microfiber cloth cover on the head, spray with water, and start washing.

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $16.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 04:20:53 UTC – Details)

Product Description

The Ideal Windshield Cleaning Tool：

Our car window cleaner come with two different panels for you to use. Through simple replacement, you can easily use them to clean car windows inside and outside, and good for all size cars, RVs, SUV and trucks. Keep your car windshield cleaning for perfect visibility.

Application of Auto Windshield Cleaning Tool :

1. Car windshield cleaner tool are great works as a fog & moisture removal tool.

2. Windshield cleaner tool /car window cleaner tool is also an ideal tool for home cleaning.

3. The car windshield cleaner is great for clean car windows inside and outside, and good for all size cars, RVs, SUV and trucks

4. You can also used for cleaning house, include windows, television, monitor, kitchen walls, bathrooms mirrors, even tables and floors at home.

Windshield Inside Cleaning Tool Specifications:

Material: Aluminum Alloy / Plastic ( ABS ), Microfiber

Brush Length: 63.98cm / 25.19 inch

Brush Head: 15 x 10cm / 5.9 x 3.9 inch

Triangular Brush Head: 13 x 14.5cm / 5.1 x 5.7 inch

Maximum Flip Angle: 180°

Covers Head Color: Yellow, Grey, Blue

Reusable Microfiber Pads：

Car windshield cleaner tool come come with 4pcs washable & reusable cloth (2x yellow+1x grey+1x blue), they are made of microfiber fine fluffed material, can remove more dirt and dust, easy to clean, which helps keep it effective, and never cause streaking after cleaning.

Car Windshield Cleaner Tool Install Instruction:

1. Hold the ergonomic non-slip part with one hand(Note: Don’t wear the ergonomic side upside, it should be downside install).

2. Hold the bottom of windshield cleaner with one hand and hold the top of the handle with the other hand, turn left the long handle to extend the handle.

3. Hold the middle black part and hold the handle with the other hand and than turn right to tightened it.

4. Use two finger to hold the cylindrical button, slowly push in to install the handle.

Car Windshield Cleaner Tool Package Includes:

1 X Extendable Handle

1X Detachable Rectangle Panel

1X Detachable Triangle Panel

4 X Microfiber Cloth (2pcs Yellow+1pcs Grey+1pcs Blue)

1 X Empty Bottle

【High Quality】The handle of the windshield cleaning tool is made of aluminum alloy material, sturdy and reliable, not easy to break and deform. And comes with 4pcs washable & reusable pads (2xyellow + 1xgrey + 1xblue) the cloth that are made of strong water absorption coral fleece fabricty never causes streaking after cleaning.
【180° Rotating Head Design】Our car window cleaner designed with 180° Pivoting& Rotating Head-helps to provide better leverage and full contact to all surfaces to remove troublesome gunk in the corner of windshield, ideal for car interior & exterior cleaning.
【Easy to Use】The windshield cleaner with the extendable handle and pivoting head getting to those hard-to-reach car window bases is simple. Do not need any soap to clean the pads, just only water, it would be clean the fogs, stains, dust ,dirt on the glass, even clean the windshield corner easily!
【Multiple Uses】Car windshield cleaner tool is an ideal choice for dehumidification and demisting of windshield glass. Our inside windshield cleaner tool come with two different panels for you to use. Through simple replacement, you can easily use them to clean car windows inside and outside, and good for all size cars, RVs, SUV and trucks, and also are suitable for kitchens, bathrooms, furniture, mirrors, ceramic, shower stalls, to meet your different household cleaning needs.
【Package Includes】Our windshield cleaning tool inside come with 1pcs extendable handle and 2pcs detachable panel (1pcs square panel+1pcs triangle panel ) and 4pcs microfiber cover cloths (2pcs yellow+1pcs grey+1pcs blue) and a small spray bottle.

The Ideal Windshield Cleaning Tool：

Our car window cleaner come with two different panels for you to use. Through simple replacement, you can easily use them to clean car windows inside and outside, and good for all size cars, RVs, SUV and trucks. Keep your car windshield cleaning for perfect visibility.

Application of Auto Windshield Cleaning Tool :

1. Car windshield cleaner tool are great works as a fog & moisture removal tool.

2. Windshield cleaner tool /car window cleaner tool is also an ideal tool for home cleaning.

3. The car windshield cleaner is great for clean car windows inside and outside, and good for all size cars, RVs, SUV and trucks

4. You can also used for cleaning house, include windows, television, monitor, kitchen walls, bathrooms mirrors, even tables and floors at home.

Windshield Inside Cleaning Tool Specifications:

Material: Aluminum Alloy / Plastic ( ABS ), Microfiber

Brush Length: 63.98cm / 25.19 inch

Brush Head: 15 x 10cm / 5.9 x 3.9 inch

Triangular Brush Head: 13 x 14.5cm / 5.1 x 5.7 inch

Maximum Flip Angle: 180°

Covers Head Color: Yellow, Grey, Blue

Reusable Microfiber Pads：

Car windshield cleaner tool come come with 4pcs washable & reusable cloth (2x yellow+1x grey+1x blue), they are made of microfiber fine fluffed material, can remove more dirt and dust, easy to clean, which helps keep it effective, and never cause streaking after cleaning.

Car Windshield Cleaner Tool Install Instruction:

1. Hold the ergonomic non-slip part with one hand(Note: Don’t wear the ergonomic side upside, it should be downside install).

2. Hold the bottom of windshield cleaner with one hand and hold the top of the handle with the other hand, turn left the long handle to extend the handle.

3. Hold the middle black part and hold the handle with the other hand and than turn right to tightened it.

4. Use two finger to hold the cylindrical button, slowly push in to install the handle.
